overview: An epic story about a group of American libertarians told in a unique manner, as both an audio performance and an experimental film. The piece features an ensemble cast of 15 actors, each individually recorded and then edited together sentence-by-sentence to create a spoken word experience that activates the power of the mindâ€™s eye. As the drama unfolds, the image slowly transitions from pure black to blinding white throughout the duration of the film.
title: The Republic
